about_the_game:
This is a exciting VR virtual simulation game, bringing players to Afghanistan battlefields, driving the steel beast to fight fiercely with the enemy in the city.

This is an action shooting, full of exciting VR virtual simulation games. Players will play a tank driver above the Afghan battlefield. In cities, control your own tanks, use weapons and strategies to destroy the enemy's tank.



In the game, players will drive tanks in the streets of the city to find and attack hostile goals. With the progress of the game, the enemy's attack will continue to increase. Players need to take their own protective measures to attack as much as possible to eliminate more hostile goals. At the same time, the enemy's attack will also cause damage to the armor of the tank. After the armor is cleared, the battle fails.

The game has multiple levels, and each level requires players to destroy the goals of different quantities. Through VR technology, let the city's market scene be displayed realistic in front of the player, letting players seem to be on the real battlefield. Players can observe the surrounding environment through the sight of the tank, and use manipulating the handle to achieve the movement, aiming and attacking operations of the tank through manipulating the handle. Each attack will bring a shocking explosion effect, allowing players to feel the cruelty and nervousness of the war.



In general, this VR virtual simulation game is full of stimuli and challenges. It not only allows players to experience the real battle scene, but also exercise players' combat skills and strategic vision. If you like this type of game, try it, I believe you will fall in love with this game.

Game operation:

Action of the left handle wheel disk control tank
Right handle control turret movement
Right handle trigger control firing
